description: This file initializes an agent with a knowledge base sourced from an S3 PDF document and runs a query asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base and handles queries.

classes.name: S3PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads data from an S3 PDF document.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface using PostgreSQL with pgvector extension.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads or reloads the knowledge base, optionally recreating it.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously prints the response to a query, optionally in markdown format.
